story.name: add_to_wish_list.story
story.scenarios:
Scenario:Allow Customers add product to wishlist from QW. Given I am on QW with configurable product as customer. When I click Add to Wishlist button. Then Quickview module closes and adds the product to her wishlist.
Scenario:Allow Users not logged in or does not has account add product to wishlist from QW. Given I am on QW with gift cart product as User. When I click Add to Wishlist button. Then Quickview module closes and she is navigated to the Account Creation page.
